meanings.definition: Filled with a continuous humming or buzzing sound.
meanings.sent1: The beehive was abuzz with activity.
meanings.sent2: The forest was abuzz with the sounds of insects.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was abuzz with the students' whispers.
meanings.sent4: The city was abuzz with the energy of rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The garden was abuzz with the gentle hum of bees.

meanings.definition: Excited or lively activity or conversation.
meanings.sent1: The party was abuzz with laughter and music.
meanings.sent2: The market was abuzz with vendors calling out their wares.
meanings.sent3: The office was abuzz with news of the upcoming promotion.
meanings.sent4: The stadium was abuzz with the cheers of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The school was abuzz with the excitement of the upcoming field trip.
